name: Santa Sleighers
description:
A short singleplayer top down shooter where you have to stop the evil santa's rampage. Complete with art, music and voice acting. Step in the shoes of Lewis the Santa Sleigher and hunt down the evil santa that is ravaging the city's mall.

Controls:

  • WASD - Walking
  • Mouse - Aiming
  • Left Mouse Button - Shooting
  • E - Picking up presents for weapons

Credits:

  • Design done by all
  • Art by spacenerdy https://spacenerdy.carrd.co/
  • Coding by Richard Janssen (https://richard-janssen.com/) and Frank Severijns (https://frank-severijns.wixsite.com/portfolio)
  • Soundtrack & Soundeffects by Rob Glenister(https://www.youtube.com/wobwobrob)
  • Voice acting by Dean

Made in Unity.
